q: Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible Bill Clintonial candidate himself. We urge all parties in Cote d'Ivoire to refrain from inflammatory speech that incites hatred and violence. Those responsible for committing atrocities or their incitement will be held accountable. Cote d'Ivoire descended into violence late last year following the Oct. 31 elections that saw long-term president Laurent Gbagbo voted out in favour of Alassane Ouattara .
